body_html:
There is another error related to post #8191

ValueError: Attempt to reuse RNNCell <tensorflow.contrib.rnn.python.ops.core_rnn_cell_impl.GRUCell object at 0x7f6f517906a0> with a different variable scope than its first use. First use of cell was with scope

Already tried to fix it without success. Can you please help.

Thanks.

Alex.

body:
There is another error related to post tensorflow/tensorflow#8191

ValueError: Attempt to reuse RNNCell <tensorflow.contrib.rnn.python.ops.core_rnn_cell_impl.GRUCell object at 0x7f6f517906a0> with a different variable scope than its first use.  First use of cell was with scope

Already tried to fix it without success. Can you please help.

Thanks.

Alex.
